---
name: GenericOnly
summary: Generic instructions without Claude Skill component
---

# GenericOnlyIntegration

This integration provides only generic AI instructions, no Claude Skill.

## Description

Use this integration to test generic-only installation workflows.

## Instructions

These instructions will be added to AGENTS.md or CLAUDE.md when installed.

## Features

- Generic AI guidance
- Project-level documentation
- No skill-specific functionality

## Usage

Install using the --generic flag to add to markdown tables.
